original_text: You say, “You see that the rich person no longer has a house. Wicked people no longer have homes to live in.” You say, “You see that the rich person no longer has a house. Wicked people no longer have homes to live in.” You say, “You see that the rich person no longer has a house. Wicked people no longer have homes to live in.” You say, “You see that the rich person no longer has a house. Wicked people no longer have homes to live in.” You say, “You see that the rich person no longer has a house.
korean_text: 너희의 말이 귀인의 집이 어디 있으며 악인이 살던 장막이 어디 있느냐 하는구나

sentences.original_text: the rich person no longer has a house
sentences.korean_translation: 부자는 더 이상 집을 갖지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: Wicked people no longer have homes
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 더 이상 집을 갖지 않습니다
